sentences.en: An antifreeze a liquid that is added to water to keep it from freezing.
sentences.cn: 一种甜味但有毒的浆状液体,用作防冻液和溶剂.

sentences.en: But it was really ( diethylene glycol ), a low - cost substitute commonly used in automobile antifreeze.
sentences.cn: 但实际上使用的添加剂是二甘醇, 一种通常用于汽车防冻剂的低成本代用品.

sentences.en: But it was really diethylen eglycol, a low - cost substitute commonly used in automobile antifreeze.
sentences.cn: 但是其实其中的添加剂为二甘醇3,4-, 一种经常用于汽车防冻剂的廉价替代品.

sentences.en: Choosing ethylene alcohol as antifreeze can meet requests of drilling work.
sentences.cn: 选择乙二醇作为钻井液的防冻剂可以满足勘探钻进工作的要求.

sentences.en: Comprehensive thermos method that using a small amount of antifreeze and thermal insulation combined, for reference of comprehensive heat storage method of the specific implementation method.
sentences.cn: 综合蓄热法即采用少量防冻剂与蓄热保温相结合，以下为供参考的综合蓄热法具体实施的办法。 。

sentences.en: DEG is used in antifreeze and as a solvent.
sentences.cn: DEG是 一种溶剂,一般用作生产防冻剂.

sentences.en: Ethanol has many uses as a solvent, raw material , extraction medium , antifreeze gasoline additive and substitute.
sentences.cn: 乙醇有毒,危害中枢神经系统,但对某些人是一种嗜好性毒品, 导致酒精中毒症.

sentences.en: Fill the cooling system with antifreeze as a protection against frost.
sentences.cn: 在冷却系统里加防冻剂以防止霜冻.

sentences.en: I really need some antifreeze in me on cold days like this.
sentences.cn: 我在这么冷的天里真的需要一些酒精饮料.

sentences.en: Inhibitors of many kinds of metals in antifreeze were studied.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了防冻液中多金属高温下的缓蚀剂.

sentences.en: New findings suggest that martian water contained so much salt that It'served as antifreeze.
sentences.cn: 新发现表明,火星水曾经含有大量起着防冻剂作用的盐分.

sentences.en: On their seventh wedding anniversary in 2005, she put the antifreeze in his red wine.
sentences.cn: 机会终于来了.在他们的七周年纪念日那一天, 她把防冻液掺在李的红酒里.

sentences.en: Such measures as pipeline heat preservation and antifreeze increase are confined.
sentences.cn: 采取的管线保温,加防冰剂等措施受到一定限制.

sentences.en: Suihua Dongfeng Automobile production plants mainly in antifreeze, lubricants, car - care products based.
sentences.cn: 绥化东峰厂主要以生产汽车防冻液, 润滑油, 汽车护理用品为主.

sentences.en: The antifreeze idea comes from an analysis of martian rocks and mineral deposits.
sentences.cn: 火星水含有防冻剂的观点来自一项对火星岩石和矿床的分析.

sentences.en: The chemical, ethylene glycol, is widely used in products from polyester fibres to antifreeze for cars.
sentences.cn: 乙二醇目前广泛应用于各种产品中，包括聚酯纤维和汽车防冻剂。

sentences.en: The frogs' resilience is linked to a shifting of water to areas less likely to be damaged by freezing, as well as natural "antifreeze" in their blood.
sentences.cn: 这种蛙类的回复机制是这样的：通过把水分转移到一些不会被冰冻伤害的部位，以达到一种“血液防冻剂”的目的。

sentences.en: Therefore, the antifreeze protein to the Antarctic cod an amazing capacity of low temperature.
sentences.cn: 因此, 抗冻蛋白赋予南极鳕鱼一种惊人的抗低温能力.

trans.tran_en: a liquid that is put in the water in car engines to stop it from freezing
